show.title: Investing in Regenerative Agriculture and Food

title: 128 Laura Ortiz, let financiers being seduced by Latin America biodiversity wealth
subtitle: 128 Laura Ortiz, let financiers being seduced by Latin America biodiversity wealth
summary:
A conversation with Laura Ortiz, social entrepreneur, chief purpose officer and co founder of SVX Mexico, about how “transformative finance” is the portal towards regenerative investments and how SVX’s “currency” is trust.
